Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Establishes environmental standards for the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
Summary: Establishes environmental standards for the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 154 of the laws of 1921, relating to the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, in relation to establishing environmental standards for the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
